'15 - Green Edition

Written on September 1st , 2015 by Plv

Millennial is a minimalist Jekyll theme. The purpose of this theme is to provide a simple, clean, content-focused publishing platform for your publication site or blog. Below you can find everything you need to get started.

Getting Started

Using Millennial

Questions?

This theme is completely free and open source software. You may use it however you want, as it is distributed under the MIT License. If you are having any problems, any questions or suggestions, feel free to tweet at me, or file a GitHub issue.
